title: Diary of a Giraffe. Harry and Bedtime
description: A Wonderful Bedtime Story for Kids 3-5! AVAILABLE On AMAZON!I appreciate your REVIEW!https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07FMFNMWL-An incredibly colorful bedtime story children's picture book about a very kind giraffe with brown eyes named Harry, who comes to help all kids who cannot go to bed quickly or have bedtime fears and worries.-Giraffes long neck reaches any window of the house if needed!-Harry's inspiring stories and magic gifts help every kid to fall asleep calmly and quickly.-25 HD quality pages with bright and exciting pictures will amuse children and their parents.-An excellent choice for reading all the way with a child before going to bed or as a gift to preschool children ages 3 4 5 who have the common bedtime problems.ENJOY READING!
author: Jenny  Mitchell
